articles.author: Wayne Cole
articles.title: Asia breathes sigh of relief as U.S. jobs fail to shock - Reuters
articles.description: Asian shares firmed on Monday while the dollar wavered after the anxiously awaited May U.S. payrolls report showed the recovery on track but not so hot that it might bring forward a policy tapering from the Federal Reserve.
articles.content: Asian shares firmed on Monday while the dollar wavered after the anxiously awaited May U.S. payrolls report showed the recovery on track but not so hot that it might bring forward a policy tapering f… [+2845 chars]

articles.title: Australian Covid-19 outbreak, shipping delays see Auckland beer festival postponed - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: Weeks-long delays and heavy congestion at "almost every NZ port" means the Great Australasian Beer Spectacular has been put on ice.
articles.content:
A craft beer festival has been postponed due to shipping delays and the ongoing effects of the Covid-19 outbreak in the Australian state of Victoria.
 The Great Australasian Beer Spectacular (GABS) … [+1984 chars]

articles.title: Growth in New Zealand's art sector a silver lining of the pandemic - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: OPINION: As countries across Asia actively invest in the arts, New Zealand has the opportunity to benefit from being part of the fastest-growing art market in the world.
articles.content: OPINION: The past 18 months have brought the value of the arts into sharp relief. With international travel restricted, we have relied on books, screens, music, the theatre and galleries to transport… [+5700 chars]
